text: Ceroplesis sudanica is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Per Olof Christopher Aurivillius in 1925. It is known from Sudan, from which its species epithet is derived.BioLib.cz - Ceroplesis sudanica. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Ceroplesini Category:Beetles described in 1925
title: Ceroplesis sudanica
